availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah "Betsy" Griggs Abney. Father of William Abney, Singleton Abney, Synthia A. Abney, Asa Abney, Rebecca J. Abney, Martha Abney, Silas Abney, Speed S. Abney, and John King Abney. Farmer in Estill County in 1850. Farmer in Estill County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 73B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 149.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Irvine, p. 552B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #30543.
